func SumAbsAndDetail(nums []int, label string, verbose bool) (sum int, detail string, err error) {
	sum = 0
	detail = ""
	for i := 0; i < len(nums); i++ {
		if nums[i] > 0 {
			sum += nums[i]
			if verbose {
				detail += fmt.Sprintf("%d,", nums[i])
			}
		} else if nums[i] < 0 {
			sum += -nums[i]
			if verbose {
				detail += fmt.Sprintf("(%d),", nums[i])
			}
		}
	}
	if sum == 0 {
		return 0, "", fmt.Errorf("empty result for %s", label)
	}
	if label != "" {
		detail = label + ": " + detail
	}
	return sum, detail, nil
}
